metadata.title: CVE-2021-25292 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. The PDF parser allows a regular expression DoS (ReDoS) attack via a crafted PDF file because of a catastrophic backtracking regex.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-25292` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 8.1.2-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 8.1.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.1.2-1').
